centredashboard.qualitycheck: Yet to Move for Quality Check

portaladmin.trainevalcentrecerticmmnt: Review and Approve the Certification Application forms received from the Training Centres.
portaladmin.stdrdcoursecerticmmnt: Review and Approve the Standards & Customized Course Application forms received from the Training Centres.
portaladmin.centrecerticmmnt: Review and Approve the Certification Application forms received from the Technical Evaluation Centres.
portaladmin.batchmgmntcmmnt: Track the status of the Batches created by the Training Centres.
portaladmin.invoicemgmntcmmnt: View the Invoices issued to the Technical Evaluation Centres and the Payment Status towards the Centre Certification Fee, Royalty Fee.
portaladmin.invoicemgmnt: View the Invoices issued to the Training Centres and the Payment Status towards the Centre Certification Fee, Course Certification Fee, Royalty Fee.

journaymap.basicregform: Basic Registration Form to be filled and submitted. Set Password and login.
journaymap.filltheappfor: Fill the Application form and submit for Desktop Review.
journaymap.onliveriand: Online verification and validation is done by OPAL USP Admin.
journaymap.formthedashonreci: From the Dashboard on receiving the Certificate, the Training Centre can apply for their Branches too and the same process is repeated until Issue of Certificate to the Branch. Option to apply for OPAL USP Standard Courses or Customise Offered Courses will be enabled. An Audit is done again based on the courses applied for and the Staff are subjected to Evaluation process. The evaluated staff are issued a Staff Card which contains details of the Course Category, Sub-Category and Validity period of the courses.
journaymap.auditisdononthe: Audit is done on the documents and application form submitted. Audit dates can be rescheduled by the Auditor. An onsite Audit is done as part of the Site Evaluation and Staff Training skills are observed on any one Staff (randomly) during the Audit.On Approval of Site, a Certificate is issued to the Centre with Grades and Validity period.
journaymap.paygateisenab: Payment Gateway is enabled for Online Payment & Offline Payment (Bank, Cash, Cheque); Upload Payment evidence if offline.

info.mainoffice: View details of the Main Office Certification such as Status, Date of Expiry and Grade.
info.branoffi: View the status of all the Branch Office certifications.
info.overal: View and track the Overall Staff available in your Company.
info.cours: View and track the validity status of the Courses offered by your Company.
info.batch: Track the status of the batches at your Training Centres.
info.invoice: View the status of the Invoices issued to your Company for Training & Assessment.
